Name: Doom of the Clawn
About the game: The walking circus had just arrived to your town, in need of new members. You stumbled upon them, hoping to join but instead were taken and trapped inside their lair. Armed with a toy gun and the will to survive, you get up and start your escape! Features Unique Puzzles Fun Mazes A Scary Clown Will the Clawn prevail or will you put a stop to his terror?!
Meta Title: Doom of the Clawn: Feb 6, 2020, 1scGames and Full Overview
